place.district_full_name: Residential High Density and Commercial Overlay
Residential High Density and Commercial Overlay

llm_output.rationale: The provided text describes the Residential High Density and Commercial Overlay (RHDC) zoning district, but does not specify a minimum lot size requirement for this district. The closest relevant information is in section 15-140, which states that lots must contain at least one and one half acres of contiguous land under single ownership to take advantage of the RHDC overlay district provisions. However, this is not explicitly stated as a minimum lot size requirement.
